entry.title: Bootstrap 2 theme
entry.summary:
This is (yet another) theme for Pelican inspired by Twitter Bootstrap 2.0.

It supports Font-Awesome icons, tag clouds, translations, and other features from Pelican's default notmyidea theme.

You can see this theme live via my Github Page, which will be kept up-to-date with the latest version of this theme …
entry.content:
This is (yet another) theme for Pelican inspired by Twitter Bootstrap 2.0.

It supports Font-Awesome icons, tag clouds, translations, and other features from Pelican's default notmyidea theme.

You can see this theme live via my Github Page, which will be kept up-to-date with the latest version of this theme.

Feel free to use it.

Screenshot
